name: bigbluetrunk
description: Online community site on family travel.
overview:
bigbluetrunk (www.bigbluetrunk.com) is an online community site on family travel.

As parents still looking to take - and enjoy! - trips and vacations, we discovered that real and practical advice for families was hard to come by. We realized that it was people like you that have the really useful insights and ideas to share and decided to create bigbluetrunk, an online community and resource for family travel.

Our site was created for you to source and share great ideas. Use the site to read and create reviews on hotels, accommodation, restaurants, things to do and products. You can share your family travel experiences by creating blogs and use forums to ask and answer questions. There is also an editorial section with informative articles.
